name: Classes More Than 5 Students
desc:
There is a table courses with columns: student and class

Please list out all classes which have more than or equal to 5 students.


For example, the table:


+---------+------------+
| student | class      |
+---------+------------+
| A       | Math       |
| B       | English    |
| C       | Math       |
| D       | Biology    |
| E       | Math       |
| F       | Computer   |
| G       | Math       |
| H       | Math       |
| I       | Math       |
+---------+------------+


Should output:

+---------+
| class   |
+---------+
| Math    |
+---------+



Note:
The students should not be counted duplicate in each course.

templates.defaultCode: # Write your MySQL query statement below

mysql: Create table If Not Exists courses (student varchar(255), class varchar(255))
